challenge.title: Build a Responsive Portfolio Website
challenge.description: Create a responsive portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
challenge.requirements: Must include a homepage, about section, and contact form.

challenge.title: Design a Mobile To-Do App
challenge.description: Design a simple to-do list app for mobile devices.
challenge.requirements: Include add, edit, and delete task functionality.

challenge.title: Implement a Binary Search Tree
challenge.description: Implement a binary search tree with insert, delete, and search operations.

challenge.title: Create a RESTful API
challenge.description: Build a RESTful API for a blog platform.
challenge.requirements: Support CRUD operations for posts and comments.

challenge.title: Build a Responsive Portfolio Website
challenge.description: Create a responsive portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
challenge.requirements: Must include a homepage, about section, and contact form.

challenge.title: Currency Converter
challenge.description: Create a currency converter using a public API.
challenge.requirements: Support at least 5 currencies and automatic conversion.

challenge.description: Design a simple to-do list app for mobile devices.
challenge.requirements: Include add, edit, and delete task functionality.

challenge.description: Implement a binary search tree with insert, delete, and search operations.
